resources.string: Must be in stopped state to access setup
Must be in stopped state to access config
Not installed !\nRun first Setup using the menu button and pressing Setup
Not configured !\nConfigure first using the menu button and pressing Configure
This will download the required files from the Internet. This needs a working Internet connection
This will install the downloaded files after having created a backup of overridden files. Your phone needs to be rooted for this to work
Go to the configuration screen to set your IPv6 tunnel informations
This will remove the installed files and restore the initial state from the backup
You need to enter your sixxs.net login informations. If you don\'t have and account create one on <a href=\"http://www.sixxs.net\">http://www.sixxs.net<a>
Search available and compatible tunnels for your account and select the desired one

v0.8
- remove auto reconnect on lost tunnel as of Sixxx.net's policy
- enable not entering a tunnel id for TIC passwords
v0.7
- fix download of corrupted file on some devices
v0.6
- fix install bug "tar: invalid option --j"
- automatically reconnect on network changes

v0.5
- fix install for some Samsung Galaxys

v0.4
- autodetect available tunnels

v0.3
- fix download bug for Honeycomb and ICS
